metadata.name: Eiffel is Forever
metadata.description:
Its New years Eve
Its a lockdown
Im standing lonely in front Of the Tower

I passed the curfew time
Police are On the main street and don't seem to care
Im at the Park side right below the tower
This moment feels surreal

It is truly surreal standing at midnight along in entire Paris outside

Till today I am still digesting the happening..

I decided to express this feeling with a gemstone an a liquified gemstone becoming a bubble that peals off the reality and transcend into a memory of mine

Objects reflect the possible reality outside and the true fact inside in different forms

I take the best of it and bring it with me forever

I used some gold leaf covering in different translucencies on the forms  - because this moment was golden and will never be back

Diamonds are forever maybe
Tower is there forever maybe
This golden feeling is with me forever 
Its scary , encouraging, unique, meditative, expensive - my saving...  money is nothing - life is everything.. live it every day
